CustomField.formula: TEXT(Year((Date_Actioned_DD_MM_YYYY__c))) & "/" & IF( Month((Date_Actioned_DD_MM_YYYY__c))<10, "0"& TEXT(MONTH((Date_Actioned_DD_MM_YYYY__c))), TEXT(Month((Date_Actioned_DD_MM_YYYY__c)))) & "/" & IF( DAY((Date_Actioned_DD_MM_YYYY__c))<10, "0"&TEXT(DAY((Date_Actioned_DD_MM_YYYY__c))), TEXT(DAY((Date_Actioned_DD_MM_YYYY__c))))
CustomField.label: Date Actioned YYYY/MM/DD
